To add music for the girls to dance to, right click the vghd icon in the taskbar. Select options. Then in the preferences menu on the right side click the + next to music. Click add file and point to your music folder and select the songs you want these little strippers to strut their stuff to. My personal favorite is ZZ Top "Legs".

But the best part about this program is that you don't have to tip the girls!!!
This is the most genius and beautiful thing ever created by mankind, and we will all burn in hell for not giving these girls their dollars. Have mercy.

That's the best thing I have ever downloaded. You can't get this stuff at a whole lotta sites out there. I was lucky to find this torrent alive.

[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Totem\{whatever}]

so deleting that whole branch should remove everything for you.

If you have a trial version installed, or for those people having problems saying they cant see any full show version (0) you might have a previously installed version of vghd weather its trial or cracked, different versions wont work with the models data, you have to uninstall it and clean the registry of junk left behind. the registry files to delete of the current trial version they must be entirely removed before installing, here are the keys you need to delete:

1) Go to Start>Run>Regedit>and find these keys and delete them all:

2) Check and delete following registery folders if found:

HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Spin2\
HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Totem\
HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SoftwarePolicie\Totem\

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\MiKit4\
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\SPsoft\
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\WindowsCurrent\Version\Uninstall\vghd\

If your in windows X64 check also under:

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\

The invalid install is probably because you did not unpack all the parts properly. Try extracting them by:
1. Select all the parts and right click
2. Extract to: C:/
3. Run the .reg
4. Enjoy! :D
